name: Wiz (Ddollz)
description:
It's better to play on Fullscreen

Hello ! this is my 3rd game jam (Major Game Jam)  also my 5th game 
The Theme: Love
Limitation: Sprite Sheet 128x128
The game is rouge-like where the wizard have to survive 10 Waves to become as ONE
Player can control two characters by pressing "Q" the two characters shares life but their magic is seperated when other one lost his mana the other one must protect the other.

Ps: The game is only on development I could added more features but i didn't have time i started late :(
